text: Sargocentron ensifer, more commonly known as the yellow-striped squirrelfish, is a member of the family Holocentridae. It is native to the Pacific Ocean from southern Japan to New Caledonia, Hawaii and the Pitcairn Islands. It lives in deep reefs at depths between , hiding in crevices by day and foraging for food by night. It feeds on small fishes and crustaceans and can reach sizes of up to SL, though a length of TL is more common. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Holocentridae Category:Fish described in 1859 Category:Fish of the Pacific Ocean
title: Sargocentron ensifer
